name: Dark Slowking
author: Tomokazu Komiya
flavor_text: Each time it yawns, the Shellder on its head releases an enzyme that makes it grow even smarter.

abilities.name: Cunning
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, look at the top card of your opponent’s deck. Then, you may have your opponent shuffle his or her deck. This power can’t be used if Dark Slowking is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.effect: Don’t apply Weakness or Resistance for this attack.
